title: MC_STARTMODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE MC_STARTMODE :
The different start modes for
MC_CamIn
.  See
the explanations there for details.

rows.Name: absolute
rows.Comment: Immediate start to absolute slave position from cam table.

rows.Name: relative
rows.Comment: Immediate start, relative to the current slave position.

rows.Name: ramp_in_pos
rows.Comment: Ramp-in with a trajectory, in positive direction.

rows.Name: ramp_in_neg
rows.Comment: Ramp-in with a trajectory, in negative direction.
